participant_1.background:
I collect dolls.
I like victorian things.
I like jazz.
I like antiques.
I am a romantic.

participant_2.background:
I live in a house in california.
I currently work at target.
Everyday after work i buy my dog a dog biscuit.
I am 5 7 tall.
I try to take a break and see a movie in theaters every other month.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks! I'm a bit of a romantic and I like to collect dolls.
That's cool! I'm not really a romantic, but I do like to collect antiques.
Oh, that's neat! What kind of antiques do you collect?
I collect anything that's old and interesting. I have a lot of old books, furniture, and toys.
That sounds really cool! I love old books.
Me too! I have a whole bookcase full of them.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I'm especially interested in history and science.
I like those too! I'm a big fan of science fiction and fantasy.
Oh, those are great genres! I love reading about different worlds and cultures.
Me too! I think it's so fascinating to learn about different ways of life.
It is! I love how reading can open up your mind to new ideas.
Me too! I think it's one of the best ways to learn about the world.
I agree! It's a great way to escape from the everyday grind and explore different possibilities.
I love that too! I think everyone should read more.
I agree! It's a great way to learn and grow as a person.
